tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalMonitoringData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id UUID NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
  humidity FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_changes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    satellite_image BYTEA,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    change_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    data_description TEXT,
    data_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTES,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE HistoricalData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    data_type VARCHAR(255),
    value FLOAT,
    record_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalChanges (
    change_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    change_type VARCHAR(255),
    change_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery_data (
    image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cloud_cover FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_changes (
    change_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    magnitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    analysis_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    satellite_id UUID,
    satellite_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE environmental changes (
    change_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    change_type TEXT,
    change_description TEXT,
    change_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    data_id UUID,
    change_id UUID,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_devices (
    satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT,
    device_type TEXT,
    launch_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status TEXT
);
